pages.title: Locating Seeds
pages.text: Many crops start growing from seeds. To start cooking with a special crop, the seeds must be located first. $(br2)Different seeds come from different places.

pages.title: Seeds From Grass
pages.text: Many $(l)seeds$() for low to the ground crops can be found in the wild $(l)$(2)grasses$() around the world, much like how $(l)$(#d1a400)wheat seeds$() are found. $(br2)$(n)These include:$() $(li)Cassava Cuttings $(li)Coffee Beans $(li)All Flower Seeds $(li)All Bush Crop Seeds $(li)All Tilled Crop Seeds

pages.title: Fruit From Leaves
pages.text: All $(l)tree crop fruits$() can be found occasionally in $(l)$(2)oak leaves$(), much like how $(l)$(c)apples$() are found. $(br2)$(n)These include:$() $(li)Apple $(li)Orange $(li)Lemon $(li)Lime $(li)Avocado $(li)Lychee $(li)Banana $(li)Mango
